title: Riverheads second in tri-meet
text:
Staff Report 8:54 p.m. EDT October 15, 2015 File CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ELKTON â€” Riverheads' boys and girls cross country teams finished second in their respective races in a tri-meet Wednesday with East Rockingham and Stuarts Draft. 
In the boys meet, the Eagles took first with 19 points while the Gladiators were second with 46 and Cougars third with 74. 
In the girls meet, the order was the same with East Rockingham taking first with 30, Riverheads second with 44 and Stuarts Draft third with 50. 
For the boys, the Eagles took four of the top five places, with Riverheads Ethan Ernst breaking them up by finishing third in 18:51, while teammate Ian Patterson was sixth in 19:33. The top Cougar finisher was Evan Burgener in eighth place in 19:41. 
In the girls race, East Rock took the top three spots. Finishing fourth was Riverheads' Kordelia Hunsberger in 23:00. Teammate Veronica Ferguson was right behind in 23:01. Hannah Chatterton led the Cougar runners, finishing seventh in 24:06. Read or Share this story: http://www.newsleader.com/story/sports/2015/10/15/riverheads-second-tri-meet/74023070/ TOP VIDEOS
